title: Pr1 22
content:
+ Page 22

[[collapsible show="Marble Hornets (animation)" hide="trible twelve was better..."]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/DW2FQar.gif width="300px"]]
i absolutely love marble hornets, so i made this gif of it.

u will prolly have to click on it to let it animate, but seriously i love marble hornets and this is the first time i have made a gif animation that i liked.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show=".flow" hide="jeeuss ufckign chrisit"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/wuFmqu3m.png width="300px"]]
k i made this a long time ago when i had this ipad because i love .flow and i love yume nikki fan games. i love .flow
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="David Lynch's Proposal (Lordstonefish's Proposal) (deleted)" hide="i loved this :c"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/eSGtAnA.gif width="300px"]]
i made this for lordstonefish's 001 proposal that i absolutely loved to death! i wont describe it in respect to if they are still trying to work on it in some other way as it seemed really ARG the way they were talking about it.

the image is animated so click on it to see it movie. stonefish this was amazing i hope ur still working on it in some way.

EDIT: WELL they recently uploaded their 4000 which is basically a continuation of that so thanks so much and I am currently thinking on how I'm going to draw it cuz its a crazy one.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Arts and Crafters (Baldi's Basics comic)" hide="WOOOOOSSSSHHHHHHH"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/GabIzBKm.png width="300px"]]
i really like Baldi's Basics, this is honestly my first ever comic so it might not be that good but Arts and Crafters is a really fun character in design and (the little) personality he has.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Baldi's Basics In Camping! (omg im excited!)" hide="aaa!!!!"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/6WHnZh6m.png width="300px"]]
the creator of Baldi's Basics recently posted on twitter a image of baldi in camping gear with the text "let's go camping!" and i had to draw this! im really excited to see what comes next in the baldi train.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="One-Man Hide and Seek (ritual creepypasta)" hide="found you!"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/Bsjkdqlm.jpg width="300px"]]
I know creepypasta gets a bad rap from quite a lot of people, but I don't think that's fair, because with every bad one there is a few diamonds in the rough, for example, my favorite ritualpasta. One-Man Hide and Seek, where you basically put a little ghost inside a doll and you play hide and seek with it.

It's not as fun as it sounds. Trust me.

Also, this is the first time I mixed reality and drawing into my work, and I loved doing it because it makes things look weird and cool and people I showed it to on Vapor Memory Discord liked it.

(picture used is from [[image https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Japanese_youth_hostel_room.jpg)
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Cloudy Copter (Baldi character)" hide="i love him!"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/DnVV3svm.png width="300px"]]
i love the new character in the camp fire demo!!! i want to thank everyone who has donated to the baldi's basics kickstarter i am so excited to see this come out!!
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="weird oc eating someone" hide="vore joke XD"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/ijN7CaWm.png width="300px"]]
while drawing this it took me a while to realize it feels really... fetishy, and im really mad about that so just keep your vore jokes by the door and take this semi-seriously plz.
[[/collapsible]]
